| History                 = New Crystalium were the inhabitants of the [[Crystalium|Crystal Labyrinth]] in [[Weirdworld (Battleworld)|Weirdworld]]. The conquering [[Eshu (Earth-616)|Master of Weirdworld]] assaulted their home as part of his plan to use the power of their energy crystals to exert his will on Weirdworld. The New Crystalium were assisted by the [[Champions (Earth-616)|Champions]] in fending off the Master's [[Fangs of the Serpent (Earth-616)|Fang Army]].{{r|Champions Vol 2 27}}
